pages.text: Auze iwo amene amakhulupirira kuti akhululukire iwo amene sakhulupirira mâ€™masiku a Mulungu kuti Iye akhoza kulipira anthu chimene amachita
Aliyense amene amachita zabwino amachitira mzimu wake ndipo aliyense amene amachita zoipa adzilakwira yekha. Pomaliza nonse mudzabwerera kwa Ambuye wanu
Ndithudi Ife tidawapatsa ana a Israyeli Buku ndi luntha lozindikira mawu a Mulungu ndi Utumwi ndipo tidawapatsa zinthu zokoma ndipo tidawakonda iwo kuposa mitundu ina yonse

Ndipo Ife tidawapatsa zizindikiro zooneka za chipembedzo. Ndipo iwo adayamba mipatuko pamene nzeru zidaperekedwa kwa iwo chifukwa cha njiru pakati pawo. Ndithudi Ambuye wako adzaweruza pakati pawo pa tsiku lachiweruzo pa nkhani zimene anali kutsutsana
Ndipo iwe takuika pa njira yoyenera. Motero tsatira yoyenerayo ndipo usatsatire zilakolako za iwo amene sadziwa chilichonse
Ndithudi iwo sangakuthandize chilichonse ku mkwiyo wa Mulungu. Ndi anthu oipa okha okha omwe amakhala ngati atetezi a wina ndi mnzake koma Mulungu ndi Mtetezi wa iwo amene amalewa zoipa
Uwu ndi umboni womveka kwa anthu ndi langizo ndi chisomo kwa anthu amene ali ndi chikhulupiriro chokhazikika

Kodi anthu amene amachita zoipa amaganiza kuti Ife tidzawasamala monga mmene tidzasamalire anthu amene amakhulupirira ndipo amachita ntchito zabwino zofanana ndi moyo wawo ndiponso imfa yawo? Iwo amaweruza molakwa
Ndipo Mulungu adalenga kumwamba ndi dziko lapansi mwachoonadi kuti mzimu uliwonse ukhoza kupeza dipo lake molingana ndi zimene udachita ndipo palibe amene adzaponderezedwa
